response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily life or work experience. Considering its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this opportunity, I am offering the product to you for $125. I understand that value perception varies, so if $125 is beyond your budget, please let me know your maximum offer, and we can discuss a mutually beneficial arrangement. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 125}
